name: Rohan Industries
overview:
Established in the year 2009, Rohan Industries is a striking organization, which is an ISO 9001-2008 certified is indulged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting of Plastic Bottles, Jars, Caps, Containers and Components.

Products: we also offer Plastic Pharmaceutical, Agricultural, Chemical, Food Grade Bottles, Cap, Seal Cap, HDPE Containers, Plug, Closure, Injection Molding Components, Automobile Plastic Components and many more.

Infrastructural Set-Up: We are blessed with a a high tech infrastructural facility located in Pune, Maharashtra, I, which aid in fulfilling the variegated needs of large number of clients.

Our Quality Assurance: We are ISO 9001-2008 certified. Being an client centric organization, we strive hard to offer our clients a wide range of quality-approved range of products.

Client Satisfaction: With the aim of standing ahead of our industry counterparts, our firm is paying utmost heed on maximizing the contentment of respectable clients. The range of the products we offer to the patrons, are made using quality tested material in tandem with international quality standards.

Our Strengths: We have earned a recommendable position in the industry for providing innovative, high quality range at reasonable cost. Our organization is fostered with a skilled team of professionals who make their sincere effort towards the growth of the company.
